title: Deepfake Deconstruction
description: Designed a modular deep-learning pipeline to reverse-engineer face-swap deepfakes, identifying the original source image with 85%+ accuracy on a custom dataset of 10,000+ manipulated images. Implemented convolutional architectures with feature extraction layers, enabling component-level model swapping for improved scalability. Addressed a real-world AI safety problem by going beyond detection to trace the origins of manipulation.

title: File Hosting Service
description: Built a file hosting service with user authentication, enabling secure access to individual files. Implemented a unique ID system stored in MongoDB, associating each file with its user for efficient retrieval. Developed server-side storage for uploaded files with REST API routes to upload, list, and download files.
